managementResponses.response: We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel and our attention. For us, our guests are most important.

review.title: Nice hotel in the center of the city
review.reviewText: Nice hotel. Nice location, near multiplaza and calle 50. The breakfast was ok.

review.title: Never could find the place
review.reviewText:
After searching for over an hour, we gave up and stayed at the Marriott.  The  gps couldn't find it,  we stopped 6 times and asked 8 different local people,  and even though we were on the correct streets, no one had heard of it. Several people offered to call the place, but there was no phone number.  EVERY Expedia listing needs to have  gps coordinates because many cities have poor signage. Expedia owes us for 2 nights. 

AND on this survey, there's no way to change the star rating, so I had to agree that it deserves 3 stars.

We will never use  Expedia again.  They have not responded to my complaint.

review.title: No windows, no hot water in shower
review.reviewText: While the breakfast was good and staff helpful, nothing else measured up.  No electric outlets or lighting by the bathroom mirror, a toe stubbing tile uplift to get to the bathroom, a plastic toilet lid, and small rooms left much to be desired.

review.title: Good location for quick stop
review.reviewText: Under renovations, but quiet at night. Close to gorgeous mall with chain stores. Everyone was pleasant. Felt safe.

review.title: Cheap rooms for only overnigth
review.reviewText:
The room was clean and ok for overnight there. 
We had a privat Bathroom, aircondition und and a TV in the room, but no window or any place to put our clothes and stuff.
review.positiveRemarks: The price for a nigth to sleep there

review.title: San Francisco, Panama City,  Panama
review.reviewText: The hotel is very small but has everything that a big hotel can assist you with. My room was good and the washroom was okay. Everything worked. Location was good for my dealings in the city. Has a restaurant and a breakfast bar in house. There are several cafes and a big mall within walking distance. Also lots of restaurants close by and in the mall.

review.title: Great staff and the room was just perfect
review.reviewText:
Quiet and relaxing.
The room was clean and the bathroom just perfect.

review.title: Great value
review.reviewText: This was more like a hostel than a hotel, but it's a cute little place and the price was excellent. The room was clean and the staff were absolutely lovely. It's not particularly close to any of Panama city's main attractions, but the neighbourhood was safe and there was a mall and eating establishments nearby. My only criticism is that the room I stayed in was literally 6 feet from the reception desk and lounge area, which meant that it was a bit noisy at times. Great value overall.

review.title: Mediterranean  hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel is centrally located. It is very close to the metro plaza mall, this mall is huge! The restaurant next to the hotel had wonderful seafood dishes at a reasonable price. The hotel Mediterranean is a very basic hotel. You have a bed TV towels provided daily, breakfast, shampoo and soap. The rooms are fairly clean, and they do makeup service daily. There is no storage available, (dresser, closet). We usually stay in higher end hotels, but we don't spend much time in them anyway, so this was good for us. As for the staff, they spoke perfect English, were very friendly, and accommodating, always willing to go the extra mile. I left my camera in a cab and the girl at the hotel called the cab company and the cab returned with the camera! I cannot say enough about the staff, we became friends, and I will miss them. They are the ones who made our stay truly perfect. Thank you Daniel, Raquel and Lade. Francisco, the owner even drove us to the airport!
review.negativeRemarks: They could add a dresser or closet.
review.locationRemarks: Many restaurants and the mall. Easy to get a cab or car rental.

review.title: Great Stay
review.reviewText: I had an extended stay at this hotel as I explored Panama City and looked at rental properties in the city.  For the price, the hotel was very good.  The staff was friendly and helpful and spoke English very well.  Many times, the staff called for a taxi and negotiated a reasonable price.  Francisco the owner was available many times during my stay, and he took me to the airport when I departed for a fair price.  The neighborhood was safe and offered a lot of nice restaurants and cafes.  I would stay at this hotel again.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked the friendliness of the staff.  They were very accommodating.
review.locationRemarks: The neighborhood was safe with some good cafes and restaurants close by.  I enjoyed the Cafe Moringa and The Bakery--very reasonable in price.

review.reviewText:
It was winderfull, i'll be back there in my trips.
The breakfast was delicious!!

managementResponses.response: Hello Omar!! Its a shame to know that even we try to help you, your were not satisfied. Yes, when you arrive to our hotel the parking lot was full (7 parking spaces) we move the bike and the car for you to be more confortable but it was not enough for you. Yes, your reservation was made for a share bathroom, i dont know the reason why it didnt said so in your printed reservation, you even call to expedia and they confirm that your reservation was made for shared bathroom, we charge NOT 30 $ we charge 10$ extra for private bathroom but that night we were sold out, so we couldnt give you an upgrade (not even free). We are a bed and breakfast chain and you can see in our pictures that we are not a big hotel. Sorry for all the inconvinience

review.title: Terrible option
review.reviewText: I did my reservation, looking something properly in base of the details of my reservation, where offer parking for car, private room, but I don't found where to park the car from the rent a car, I request to them and they make me wait long time until move one motorcycle and one car, when I came inside for make my check in, they try to give me a sharing bathroom where I suppose to pass through the front desk... I told to them, in my reservation don't mention sharing bathroom, and they try to charge to me around US $30 additional per night if I want private bathroom, I cancel at this moment my itinerary and called to Expedia for support.  After I call to a pretty good hotel, was a real hotel,  building in very good area, near of everything, and they charge to me cheape,r but level is much better. Mediterranean dreams guest house use an incorrect trick, for charge to the customer extra monies, in final is too expensive, is not hotel is a guest house, you can take better options, Panam√° is full of hotels options.

review.title: Good location
review.reviewText:
The staff arranged for a taxi from the airport to Mediterrainian Dreams, after 48 hrs of travelling. Already we were pleased. The location was close to everything that we wanted to see. The staff was helpful and our Spanish improved with their help. The rooms were spacious, clean and  
air conditioned! Very good value. We booked with Mediterrainian Dreams because of the positive reviews about Fransisco. Unfortunately he was very busy and we were unable to use his talents. Maybe he could continue the succession planning.
review.locationRemarks: Loved the Canal and historic sites. Hop on Hop off bus is a good way to start.

review.title: Very nice and comfortable hotel
review.reviewText: This B&B is very nice and clean and the staff are very nice and helpful. It is in a nice neighborhood and close to public transportation. I really enjoyed my stay.

review.title: Efficient, friendly, clean and quiet.
review.reviewText:
Stayed over night between planes. Pick up at airport was very efficient and friendly. Only about $5 more than taxi and so much easier.

Room was clean, hot water and shower worked very well. Staff very friendly and helpful. The air conditioning worked well and was so quiet, had a great night's sleep.

review.title: This property is NOT a Hotel
review.reviewText: The Mediterranean is a Hostel; it should not be advertised as a Hotel. Management is doing a fantastic job though. The rooms are very clean and so are the washrooms. It is pretty hard to find in the City. Taxi drivers in Panama City are not familiar with Street names. The staff are amazing and very helpful. There are towels and amenities available. The AC works and pop and water can be purchased at the Front Desk. You can also arrange for transportation to the Airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Bathrooms and electrical outlets in rooms.

review.title: Great staff
review.reviewText: Francisco met us at the airport and gave us lots of information about the city and Panama. We stayed 3 nights and had use of the kitchen.
review.positiveRemarks: Staff were extremely helpful, friendly and spoke excellent English. Breakfast was good and soon they will have a small tapas restaurant
review.negativeRemarks: A fan in the room so guests don't have to use a/c and maybe a chair in the room.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is very close to a big mall and restaurants. It's easy to get a taxi into the city.

review.reviewText: amazing stuff , very helpful, we been there for 3 days, this is a low cost hostel with warm and helpful stuff

review.title: Very good place, affordable and comfortable
review.reviewText:
We were there for some nights, staff, they so nice and helpful for know the city and locate different parts as we wanted.
Really was a very good experience we decided stay in this place surely if we come back panama we wont hesitate is chose this hotel again.
review.positiveRemarks: Well many things, really good breakfast, location, pretty close to one of the most important shopping mall and very good neighborhood
review.locationRemarks: Hotel is locates in a beautiful area in the city, safe and close to everything, few blocks away you can find restaurants, ATM, shopping mall and many

review.title: Just the BASICS
review.reviewText: Just the things I needed when I needed them.  There was a television set, air conditioner, and comfortable bed with pillows.  I requested a wake up call at 4 am and the hotel management came through like champs!  Making reservations was easy.  A late check-in no problems.   I would definitely choose this hotel again.  Thank You.
